name: smallbooks
description: An application for finding and sharing short stories.

scripts.windows_install: npm run windows-dependencies && npm run server-install && npm run client-install
scripts.client-install: cd client && npm install && npm i bootstrap reactstrap react-router-dom uuid react-transition-group redux react-redux redux-thunk axios react-cookie @fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons @fortawesome/react-fontawesome @fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons@prerelease && npm install react-router-dom && npm install typeface-roboto --save
scripts.server-install: npm install jsonwebtoken express mongoose concurrently bcrypt && npm install -D nodemon

author: Jake Grafenstein
